ip_update_fail: Error registering IP (Subscription info is shown).
ip_no_change: Your IP ({ip}) was already registered on the server.
ip_conflict_error: This IP is registered by another user! To activate, change your network.
error_connect: Could not connect to the server.
dns_ip_not_available: DNS IP not found in subscription data.
admin_required_message:
To change DNS settings, the application must be run as an Administrator.
Please close and re-run the program using 'Run as administrator'.
dns_set_fail_message: Failed to set DNS. Please check your internet connection and run as Administrator.
no_active_interface: No active network connection was found to set DNS.
dns_unset_success_message: DNS settings were successfully reset to automatic (DHCP).
dns_unset_fail_message: Failed to reset DNS settings for active network interfaces.
connect_dns_tooltip: Sets the recommended secure DNS on your active network adapters.
unset_dns_tooltip: Resets DNS settings on your network adapters back to automatic (DHCP).
exit_confirm_dns_set: DNS is currently active. Do you want to disconnect and exit?
exit_confirm_no_dns: Are you sure you want to exit?
ip_wait_notice: Please wait 1 minute for the new IP to be set on the server.
error_timeout: The request timed out. Please check your internet connection and try again.
warning_add_link_first: Please add a subscription link first using the + button.
dns_connect_denied_status: Cannot connect DNS because the subscription is expired or limited.
